segments.text: I want to get a bite to eat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are you thinking of getting ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have no idea what I want .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can get a burger , or some Chinese food . Or maybe you can get some Mexican food .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wouldn't mind getting some Chinese food .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where are you going to get your Chinese food from ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When I want Chinese food , I go to Panda Express .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do they do a good job on the food ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I will get my food from Panda Express , too .
segments.speaker: S1
